title: League of Legens has encountered a problem
body: I cant open the begin screen, it says "league of legends had encountered a problem. Please re-install league of legends to try again".

replies.body: Aw, sounds like some game files might be corrupt.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and see if a force repatch can help fix this up.  Let me know if you run into any issues!
Start by opening the "Riotgames" folder and deleting "League Client" and then clicking on the "lol.launcher.admin". The client will launch after that. trust me it will work!
